channel.title: Videos for Bootstrappers
channel.description:
MicroConf is gradually adding ALL videos from past conference talks to YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHoBKQDRkJcOY2BO47q5Ruw
Business of Software has videos of almost all past conference talks here: https://businessofsoftware.org/2016/07/all-talks-from-business-of-software-conferences-in-one-place-saas-software-talks/
If you are looking for something to watch over the coming Christmas/New Year season, that should keep you going!
Don't know where to start? Then I recommend looking for the talks from Jason Cohen, Patrick McKenzie, and Peldi Guilizzoni.

item.title: Videos for Bootstrappers

item.description:
MicroConf is gradually adding ALL videos from past conference talks to YouTube:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHoBKQDRkJcOY2BO47q5Ruw

Business of Software has videos of almost all past conference talks here:

Business of Software USA – 26 Jul 16

STICKY POST: All Talks From Business of Software Conferences in One Place -...

One place to access all the talks from Business of Software Conferences. Great SaaS & Software Talks.

If you are looking for something to watch over the coming Christmas/New Year season, that should keep you going!

Don’t know where to start? Then I recommend looking for the talks from Jason Cohen, Patrick McKenzie, and Peldi Guilizzoni.
